entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid Zero Length check expression #23782
    Backlog
  • Expose ShapeDrawable.ShapeView publically #23781
  • Shell Tab icons on android do not show if a page is set to visible and navigated to immediately after. #23780
    Backlog
  • [iOS, 9.0 Preview 6] Build process of iOS projects with SkiaSharp hangs up in Release configuration in Visual Studio 17.11.0 Preview 4.0 #23776
  • [Android] Text Clipping Issue in Entry with Long Strings #23774
    Backlog
  • Need IsVisible option to MenuBarItem or MenuFlyoutItem class #23772

Closed

  • Grid Background spill outside of the background #23755
    Backlog
  • [iOS, 9.0 Preview 6] SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 4.1 has a severe memory leak on iOS #23728
  • [iOS] Entry not allow to scroll when keyboard is open #23580
  • Adding aps-environment on Entitlement.plist causes Provisioning profile issues #23542
  • ScrollView inside Grid not resizing when in landscape in ios that have safe area #23773
  • [MAUI]Clicking on 'Dessert' shows nothing. #22325
    Backlog
  • OnNavigating() is not firing under windows when using Tab/TabBar #23771
  • Maui receive event of EASessionController is lower than Xamarin. #23388

PullRequests

Created

  • Make IWindow.Content nullable #23785
  • Move WebViewDidNotLeak to UITest #23784
  • Fix Zero Length check #23783
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView not showing new items #23779
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • `IWindow.Content` can be null in Core #23775

Merged

  • [android] update AOT profile for servicing #23765
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.4 to 1.5.5 #23750
    community ✨
  • Do not solely make Visual Diagnostics available on debugger being attached #23490
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • Bring back ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #23683
    area-xaml, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Obsolete compatibility layout #23710
    area-layout
  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
  • Increase iOS Device Test Time out to 90 #23768
  • [core] Fix tests when converting with PT Locale #23764
    area-testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • Add HandlerProperties.DisconnectPolicy for controlling when DisconnectHandler is called #23738
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #23752
  • [net9.0] Obsolete the old mechanism for registrations #23723
  • HybridWebView: Invoke JS methods from .NET #23769
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [ci] Add scheduled push to nightly feed job #23721
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] CollectionView - Use compositional layouts #23758
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when trying to access private members #23671
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Delete obsolete Mappers #23712
  • [Accessibility] Add accessibility label to the menu button #23762
    t/a11y
  • Don't let Glide clear the old image on Android ImageView unless we get an error #23313
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` #23626
    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240618 based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240718 based on net9.0 branch #23751
